record.jsxtip: fires after the slider has been manipulated by the user and let go at a different value than before the drag or when the user clicks somewhere along the slider to move the handle to that position
fires at every mouse move while the user is dragging the slider
fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
